column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We finished off with dessert.  Right when we sat down for our meal
column2: I mentioned to our server that I had a yelp check-in offer for free dessert.  She acknowledged this
column3: and brought us the dessert menu at the end of the meal.  Since the check in coupon said stated "1 free dessert tapa of your choice PER GUEST
column4: each of us ordered one dessert tapa.  She took our order, and I asked if she wanted to see the check-in coupon.  She said, nah
